channel.title: Hp x10 hits bugged
channel.description: I dont know whats wrong with the hp hits, it's only when I use x10 hits, the numbers are white and there is no red splat when i hit. I've tried for about 2 hours to figure this out today and cant, if anyone can help I'd appreciate it. :s

item.title: Hp x10 hits bugged
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Try to download the original client and look throught the sprites for it?

item.title: Hp x10 hits bugged
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

you need a sprite when you trigger the 10x hp. teh reason no red splat, is there is not sprite. there is only a splat for x1. i dont know how to add teh sprite, you will have to find out how
